Header.title: Opswolf
Header.paragraph: The line between the lines, the code behind the code.

About.paragraph: Opswolf works with teams of developers to write build definitions and configuration as code. We are programmers, testers and DevOps gurus who take care of CI and CD efficiently and securely.
Why: Publish code quality and load test reports
Why2: Branching, merging and general coding guidance
